title: You 2.0: When Did Marriage Become So Hard?
description: There are signs it's getting even harder. In this episode, we explore how long-term relationships have changed over time and whether we might be able to improve marriage by asking less of it.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
